question:
Question: Navigation Instruction given at initial position: [take off and turn back and move forward towards the buildings till the brown building which have a glass on its top. now turn back and get closer to the blue building and get high and move forward till the pond arrives. now fly over the pond and move forward towards the road is visible. now turn left and move forward towards the buildings till the building have a banner named bolt cola. now move forward towards the buildings and get closer to the brown building and turn right and move forward till the road splits. now turn left and move forward towards the buildings till the blue building arrives and get closer to its bottom and stay there.]. At the initial position, you are asked to navigate according to a series of movement instructions. What is the Landmark Position from the pond when you reach your current location?  
choose:  
A. I am located on the left side of the pond.  
B. I am far away from the pond.  
C. I am located above the pond.  
D. I am located on the right side of the pond.  
E. I am located below the pond.

textgrad_result.init_answer: Option: B; Reason: The current location is far from the pond as indicated by the navigation instructions which state that after flying over the pond, the agent moved forward towards the road and then turned left to move forward towards buildings. This implies that the pond is no longer in close proximity.
textgrad_result.evaluation:
Location: [(0, 47), (47, 114), (114, 128), (128, 141), (141, 155), (155, 170), (170, 185), (185, 200), (200, 215), (215, 230), (230, 245), (245, 260), (260, 275), (275, 290), (290, 305), (305, 320), (320, 335), (335, 350), (350, 360)]
Option: [B]
Reason: The navigation instructions state that after flying over the pond, the agent moved forward towards the road and then turned left to move forward towards buildings. This implies that the pond is no longer in close proximity. The video shows the agent flying over the pond and then moving towards buildings. The final view shows the agent near the buildings, with the pond visible in the distance. Therefore, the agent is far away from the pond.
textgrad_result.final_answer: Option: B; Reason: The current location is far from the pond as indicated by the navigation instructions which state that after flying over the pond, the agent moved forward towards the road and then turned left to move forward towards buildings. This implies that the pond is no longer in close proximity.
